skrull.game.model
Class AbstractGameModel

java.lang.Object
  skrull.game.model.AbstractGameModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, IGameModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultGameModel, RockPaperScissors, TicTacToe
public abstract class AbstractGameModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGameModel

General logic common to all games.

Author:
jhodges

checkActivity

public void checkActivity()
Description copied from interface: IGameModel
Perform an activity check for the players in this game 2 types of checks should be performed here: 1. make sure the active player hasn't exceeded some reasonable threshold (ie walked away from the computer) 2. make sure we still have network connectivity to the client

Specified by:
checkActivity in interface IGameModel

createGame

public void createGame(IClientAction action)
Description copied from interface: IGameModel
Process an IClientAction.ActionType of type CREATE_GAME Note that actual game creation is taken care of upstream - this will be called after the game is created. This method is needed to provide a way of passing the value of the model back to the views.

Specified by:
createGame in interface IGameModel
